Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A widely used chemotherapeutic agent , 5 - fluorouracil ( 5 - FU ) , readily crosses the blood - brain barrier and so could have a direct effect on brain function .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| 5 - fluorouracil ( 5 - FU ) |
| blood - brain barrier |

Explanation:

1. 5 - fluorouracil ( 5 - FU ) - This is a chemotherapeutic agent used in cancer treatment.
2. blood - brain barrier - Although not a chemical, it is a biological barrier that is relevant in the context of drugs and their effects on the brain.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| 5 - fluorouracil ( 5 - FU ) |

Explanation:

1. 5 - fluorouracil ( 5 - FU ) - This is the only clear chemical entity in the paragraph. It is a chemotherapeutic agent used in cancer treatment.

The other entity, "blood - brain barrier," is not a chemical. It is a biological barrier that separates the brain from the bloodstream and plays a role in drug delivery to the brain.
